description: We get down and dirty in scene one. Lielani struggles beautifully in the mud and ruthlessly bound in hemp in the first scene. A tight crosslegged balltie leaves her vulnerable and helpless to our abuse in a pool of nasty, cold Armory water. A very unusual and tough rope suspension has Lielani squirming and screaming in scene three. Bound and ballgagged in scene four, she is put into a below ground level tank. with a cage top. The water is turned on and our heroine struggles in vain as the water level climbs. What will happen to our lovely victim? Sign in or join up to find out!
title: Lovely Lielani Submits to the Armory!
